DOC.detailed_description: About 1000 outpatient subject recruit . The inclusion criterion include clinically diagnosed primary hemifacial spasm , male female 18 80 year old informed consent obtain . The exclusion criterion include secondary hemifacial spasm , involuntary facial movement disorder , history surgery microvascular decompression facial nerve . The outcome measure include percentage treatment method HFS outpatient subject , aggrevated relieved factor HFS symptom , concomitant symptom HFS adverse event botulinum toxin treatment HFS patient .
